page.title: 14VILLAGE CLUBS
page.content: Athough{Clifton}is a small village it has a large number of{clubs.}Starting with children there is a{Mothers and {Toddlers Group}and{Playschool}which both meet in the village hall.{Cubs, {Brownies,Scouts}and{Guides}all meet in the scout hut which is on the Recreation Ground. For those who like a lot of exercise there is{Clifton {Rovers Football Club, Badminton, Yoga, {Keep Fit}and{Ramblers.}Fitness is also needed by the members of the{Bell {Ringing Group}who meet each week.There is a monthly meeting of{Nomads}(which are young wives meeting in different houses).W.I.({Womens Institute}) and{ {British Legion}are for older people. Finally there is a{Friendship Club}and that is for old-age pensioners. {by Philip Stephens (age 9)
